articles.description: The iconic home from Steven Spielberg's 1985 film 'The Goonies' has sold to a super-fan who promises to 'preserve and protect the landmark.' His friend bought the next door house for $555,000.
articles.content:
The iconic home from Steven Spielberg's 1985 film 'The Goonies' has sold to a super-fan of the movie less than a week after it hit the market. 
Property records indicate that the owners accepted an … [+5626 chars]

articles.description: On TV this Sunday: Jessica Chastain and Michael Shannon are George & Tammy, The Rookie races to stop a rampage and a When Calls the Heart vet gets Fit for Christmas.

articles.title: 'The Kashmir Files totally flat, doesn't have any inner contradictions and complexities': Nadav Lapid, IFFI jury head - The Indian Express
articles.description: While initially not keen, Nadav Lapid decided to speak to the media about his IFFI statement after he realised that it was being "manipulated" and  projected that he "ignored the tragedy" of Kashmiri Pandits.
articles.content: Paris-based writer-director Nadav Lapid, by his own admission, has “the habit of watching movies in a proper and un-influenced way”. Lapid, who was the head of International Competition of the recent… [+5878 chars]
